oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WSM Grand Ole Opry stars Flatt and Scruggs at the Springville High School
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (radio program); Flatt, Lester; Scruggs, Earl; Martha White Foods
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing the WSM Grand Ole Opry stars Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs at the Springville High School on November 9. Poster features a metal photoplate of Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs.
